content: one-skein chevron scarf a chevron stitch scarf in 3 widths narrow medium wide narrow and medium widths use approx 4 oz for a adult size scarf wide scarf will likely use 2 skeins for a nice length size g or h crochet hook and about one skein 4 oz of worsted weight yarn gauge is not critical for this project chain 22 32 42 1 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook 1 double_crochet in each next 3 chain *skip next 2 chs double_crochet in next 4 chain chain 2 double_crochet in next 4 chain* repeat from * to * once repeat from * to * twice skip next 2 chain double_crochet in next 3 chain 2 double_crochet in last chain 18 26 30 double_crochet and 1 2 3 chain 2 spaces 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet of row turn double_crochet in last double_crochet from previous row and next 3 double_crochet *skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in chain 2 space double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet * repeat from * to * once repeat from * to * twice skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in last double_crochet repeat row 2 until piece reached desired length fasten_off and weave in ends you may sell finished items from this pattern if you wish www littlemonkeysstitchnspin com copyright 2010 dena stelly
